Ancestry-Catfolk -- Male Winter Catfolk Fighter
Strength: +1 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: -1 Charisma: +2
Background: Fortune Teller Deity: Nethys
Experience: 206/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 20 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 6/11
Attribute Notes:
Armor Speed Penalty: -5 Speed
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Climbing Claws: Has a 10' climb Speed
Jungle Catfolk: Moves normally through undergrowth difficult terrain, and through undergrowth greater difficult terrain as difficult terrain
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Class: 1; General: 0 Selectable Feature Count: Catfolk (Heritage); Fighter (Key Attribute)
Feats: Aggravating Scratch; Black Cat Curse; Cat Nap; Cat's Luck; Caterwaul; Catfolk Dance; Catfolk Lore; Catfolk Weapon Familiarity; Climbing Claws; Elude Trouble; Evade Doom; Graceful Guidance; Light Paws; Luck Of The Clowder; Lucky Break; Predator's Growl; Pride Hunter; Reliable Luck; Saber Teeth; Silent Step; Springing Leaper; Ten Lives; Vicious Swing; Wary Skulker; Well-Groomed; Well-Met Traveler Fighter Features: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks); Attack Trained (Advanced Weapons); Attribute Boost (Strength); Attribute Boosts; Class Trained (Fighter); Defense Trained (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense); Fighter Feats; Fighter Key Attribute; Fighter Skills; Perception Expert; Reactive Strike; Save Expert (Fortitude; Reflex); Save Trained (Will); Shield Block; Strength Fortune Teller Features: Attribute Boost (Choose 1 from Charisma, Intelligence; Choose 1 from any); Oddity Identification; Skill Trained (Occultism; Fortune-Telling Lore) Catfolk Features: Attribute Boost (Dexterity; Charisma; Choose 1 from any); Attribute Flaw (Wisdom); Catfolk Heritage; Clawed Catfolk; Hunting Catfolk; Jungle Catfolk; Land On Your Feet; Liminal Catfolk; Low-Light Vision; Nine Lives Catfolk; Sharp-Eared Catfolk; Winter Catfolk

Well-Met Traveler: Has the Hobnobber feature
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light

Acrobatics: +3 (dexterity; trained) Diplomacy: +5 (charisma; trained) Performance: +2 (charisma; untrained)
Arcana: +5 (intelligence; trained) Fortune-Telling Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Religion: -1 (wisdom; untrained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; expert) Games Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Butchering Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +7 (charisma; expert) Stealth: +0 (dexterity; untrained)
Catfolk Lore: +5 (intelligence; trained) Medicine: -1 (wisdom; untrained) Survival: +2 (wisdom; trained)

Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Catfolk Lore): Skill Trained (Catfolk Lore)
Armor Skill Penalty: -2 strength and dexterity skills
Catfolk Lore: Skill Trained (Acrobatics; Survival)
Deity And Cause: Arcana
Fighter Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from Acrobatics, Athletics; Choose 5 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Well-Met Traveler: Skill Trained (Diplomacy)
Hobnobber: Can Gather Information in half the normal time
Hunting Catfolk: Has 30' imprecise scent, and gains +2 to Track familiar scents
Liminal Catfolk: +1 Occultism to Recall Knowledge about extraplanar creatures
Oddity Identification: +2 Occultism to Identify Magic with a fortune, mental, possession, prediction, or scrying trait
Pride Hunter: Can use lesser cover from allies to Hide
Sharp-Eared Catfolk: +2 to Seek creatures within 30' that can be heard, and can Point Out a heard creature as a free action once per rd
Springing Leaper: Can use 2 or 3 actions to double or triple vertical Leap distance, and can Long Jump in a different direction than the preceding Stride
Wary Skulker: Can Scout and Avoid Notice simultaneously
Combat
Hit Points: 21 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (2 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 14 (strength; trained)
Armor: Scale Mail Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Claws (+8 1d6+1 S; dexterity; expert); Cruuk (+6 1d6+1 B R30'; strength; expert); Jaws (+8 1d6+1 P; strength; expert); Kukri (+7 1d6+1 S; dexterity; expert); Sawtooth Saber (+5 1d6+1 S; dexterity; trained); Sickle (+7 1d4+1 S; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Catfolk Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Familiarity (Catfolk Weapons; Kama; Kukri; Scimitar; Sickle)
Clawed Catfolk: Claws inflict 1d6 HP slashing
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Saber Teeth: Jaws inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Aggravating Scratch: Critical hits with claws also inflict 1d4 HP persistent poison
Black Cat Curse: (R) R30' Forces target to reroll a successful save once per day
Cat Nap: 10 min sleep gives 1 temporary Hit Point for 1 hr once per hr
Caterwaul: (R) Gives 1 HP and a wounded condition increase to an ally reduced to 0 HP once per day
Catfolk Dance: (1) Successful Acrobatics vs. Reflex inflicts -2 Reflex on an adjacent target until the start of the next turn, or -2 Reflex and off-guard on a critical success
Catfolk Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon catfolk weapons
Diehard: Remains alive until dying 5
Elude Trouble: (R) Strides up to 20' in response to a missed melee attack, triggering no reaction from the attacking foe
Light Paws: (2) Takes a Stride and a Step, ignoring difficult terrain
Predator's Growl: (R) Attempts to Demoralize an uncovered creature, suffering no penalty for lacking a shared language
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Silent Step: (1) Steps, then Hides or Sneaks
Ten Lives: Successful DC 17 flat check upon dying instead inflicts 0 HP and dying 3
Vicious Swing: (2) Melee Strike inflicts 1 extra damage die and counts as 2 Strikes for the multiple attack penalty
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +2 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Lucky Break: Has increased Cat's Luck effects
Reliable Luck: Increased Cat's Luck effects
Cat's Luck: (F) Rerolls a failed Reflex save, Fortitude save, Acrobatics check, or Athletics check once per hr
Evade Doom: Successful DC 17 flat check negates acquiring the doomed condition
Graceful Guidance: Can Aid an ally's Reflex save
Land On Your Feet: Takes half damage from falling and does not land prone
Luck Of The Clowder: Cat's Luck also gives targets within 10' a reroll
Nine Lives Catfolk: Dying value does not affect recovery DC
Well-Groomed: +2 vs. disease, and successes vs. disease are critical successes
Winter Catfolk: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Magic
Attack: Occult Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells: Detect Magic (OC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Magic Notes: Liminal Catfolk: Knows the Detect Magic occult innate cantrip; can cast it at will
